protocol_name: Assay of anthocyanin biosynthetic enzyme activity
protocol_name_html: Assay of anthocyanin biosynthetic enzyme activity
manuscript_citation: Zhu H, Li X, Zhai W, Liu Y, Gao Q, Liu J, Ren L, Chen H, Zhu Y (2017) Effects of low light on photosynthetic properties, antioxidant enzyme activity, and anthocyanin accumulation in purple pak-choi (Brassica campestris ssp. Chinensis Makino). PLoS ONE 12(6): e0179305. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0179305

components.data: 25 mM HEPES buffer (pH 7.4) is preparated with EDTA (0.2 mM),  AsA (2 mM ), and  PVP ( 2%), which was kept in -4℃ refrigerator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 25 mM HEPES buffer (pH 7.4) is preparated with EDTA (0.2 mM),  AsA (2 mM ), and  PVP ( 2%), which was kept in -4℃ refrigerator.

components.data: Preparation of  buffer
components.name: Section

components.data: 0.2 g of leaf samples were ground in 2 ml of ice-cold 25 mM HEPES buffer ( pH 7.4 ) ,The homogenates were centrifuged at 4°C for 20 min at the speed of 12,000 r.p.m, and removed supernatants to  assay the enzymatic activities.of CHS, CHI, F3H, DFR, ANS and ANR,  using an ELISA Kit ( U.S.A TSZ biological Trade Co., Ltd.) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 0.2 g of leaf samples were ground in 2 ml of ice-cold 25 mM HEPES buffer ( pH 7.4 ) ,The homogenates were centrifuged at 4°C for 20 min at the speed of 12,000 r.p.m, and removed supernatants to  assay the enzymatic activities.of CHS, CHI, F3H, DFR, ANS and ANR,  using an ELISA Kit ( U.S.A TSZ biological Trade Co., Ltd.) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

components.data: Leaf tissue sample extraction
components.name: Section

components.data: Set  stantard wells, testing sample wells. Add standard 50 µl to standard well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set  stantard wells, testing sample wells. Add standard 50 µl to standard well.

components.data: Add standard
components.name: Section

components.data: Set blank wells separately (blank comparson wells don´t add sample and HRP-Conjugate reagent, other each step operation is same). Testing sample well. add sample dilution 40 µl to testing sample wells, then add testing sample 10 µl ( sample final dilution is 5-fold ), add sample to wells, don´t touch the well wall as far as possible, and  mix gently.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set blank wells separately (blank comparson wells don´t add sample and HRP-Conjugate reagent, other each step operation is same). Testing sample well. add sample dilution 40 µl to testing sample wells, then add testing sample 10 µl ( sample final dilution is 5-fold ), add sample to wells, don´t touch the well wall as far as possible, and  mix gently.

components.data: Add sample
components.name: Section

components.data: After closing plate with closure plate membrane, incubate for 30 min at 37℃.

components.data: Incubate
components.name: Section

components.data: 30-fold  wash solution diluted 30-fold with distiled water and reserve.

source_data.description: 30-fold  wash solution diluted 30-fold with distiled water and reserve.

components.data: Comfigurate liquid
components.name: Section

components.data: Uncover closure plant membrane, discard liquid, dry by swing, add washing buffer to every well, still for 30s then drain, repeat 5 times, dry by pat.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Uncover closure plant membrane, discard liquid, dry by swing, add washing buffer to every well, still for 30s then drain, repeat 5 times, dry by pat.

components.data: Washing
components.name: Section

components.data: Add HRP-Conjugate reagent 50 µl to each well, except blank well.

components.data: Incubate is operated with step 5, and washing is operated with step 7.

components.data: Add  chromogen solutio A 50 µl and chormogen solution B to each well, evade the light preservation for 15 min at 37℃.
